items.name: Educational Content Planning & Development
items.description: Ability to design learner-centered educational programs and plan/develop various forms of content (textbooks, educational tools, webtoons, podcasts, etc.).

items.name: Digital Education Tool Utilization & Development
items.description: Ability to integrate digital technology into education, such as website building and metaverse utilization, and to implement them as practical tools.

items.name: Problem Solving & System Thinking
items.description: Ability to analyze complex problems in educational settings and approach them systematically by finding sustainable solutions.

items.name: Collaboration & Communication
items.description: Ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with fellow teachers, parents, and students to achieve common goals.

items.name: Psychological & Career Counseling
items.description: Counseling competency to understand students' inner lives, provide emotional support, and explore career directions together.

items.name: Web Development
items.description: Website building and operation skills including HTML, CSS, JavaScript (basic), Netlify deployment (utilizing AI tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude).

items.name: Document/Content Creation
items.description: Ability to create documents and presentations using MS Office (PowerPoint, Word, Excel), Hangul, etc.

items.name: Graphic/Design
items.description: Image editing tools used for webtoon and educational tool production (programs: basic Photoshop, Illustrator operation; web service: 미리캔버스).

items.name: Data Management
items.description: Understanding of data management and utilization including experience in designing record systems (utilizing Google Sheets and Workspace).
